title: Mortgage Loan Processor (Virtual Assistant)
job_overview:
Are you the kind of person who finds satisfaction in precision, structure, and seeing things done right the first time?
If you're nodding, we might have just the role for you.

We’re looking for a Mortgage Loan Processor who’s not just great with paperwork—but someone who genuinely cares about helping people move one step closer to their goals. This role goes beyond checking boxes. It’s about making sure everything behind the scenes runs smoothly, accurately, and on time—because real lives are on the other end of every file.

What You’ll Be Doing:
You’ll be the backbone of our mortgage operations, helping ensure every loan moves forward with clarity, speed, and compliance.

Loan Processing & Documentation:
Review, verify, and manage loan applications with an eagle eye for detail.
Make sure each file is complete, accurate, and in line with lending guidelines.
Partner with internal teams and external contacts to keep deals moving and timelines on track.

Mortgage Servicing Support:
Keep loan records clean and current in our servicing system.
Monitor statuses, payments, and balances while proactively addressing any gaps.
Help generate and interpret performance reports related to loan portfolios.

Financial & Data Accuracy:
Ensure all entries and reconciliations are timely and error-free.
Support financial tracking and assist with internal reporting tasks.

Communication & Collaboration:
Keep everyone in the loop—clients, lenders, investors, and teaUpgrade to see actual infombers.
Solve issues with professionalism and urgency.
Foster a sense of ownership and reliability within the team.

You’ll Be a Great Fit If You:
Bring experience in mortgage loan processing, servicing, or a similar finance role.
Know your way around mortgage platforms—bonus if you’ve worked with The Mortgage Office.
Are known for your attention to detail and pride yourself on doing things right the first time.
Have strong organization and time management skills—you can juggle tasks without letting anything slip.
Can work independently but still value collaboration and shared goals.
Communicate clearly and professionally, whether by phone, email, or in documentation.
Adapt well to change—especially in a space that evolves with compliance and client needs.

Company Benefits:
$500 USD Sign-In Bonus if you apply between July 10 to September 25, 2025
Competitive compensation package
Opportunity to work closely with high-level executives from various industries.
Professional growth and development.
Chance to contribute to the success and growth of our clients.
Supportive and collaborative team environment.
Paid US Federal Holidays
Paid Time Off
Healthcare Package
1 Year Travel Bonus
Year-End Bonus

How to Apply:
1. Complete the Form: Start by filling out the form at Upgrade to see actual info.
2. Video Recording: Ensure you have a professional background when recording your video.
3. Be Authentic: We strongly discourage reading from a script. Instead, be genuine and let your personality shine!
4. Email Confirmation: Make sure to provide a valid email address to receive our application confirmation. If you don’t see the confirmation email, double-check for any spelling errors and resubmit the form with the correct email.
5. Next Steps: If your qualifications meet our criteria, our Recruitment Specialist will reach out to you.
